body.h1: Encoding Forms for the ISicily Project
body.p: This is a form for encoding inscriptions using the Epidoc customization of the TEI schema created specifically for the conventions adopted by the ISicily project. For more information see the ISicily GitHub Wiki.
Based on the encoding forms created by the US Epigraphy Project website.
